title: Quick Chinese duck salad
description: Just a few shop-bought ingredients go into this fragrant duck salad recipe that’s ready in only 30 minutes.
ingredients: ½  head Chinese leaf lettuce, shredded

method.Step 1: Cook the noodles in boiling water for 3-4 minutes. Drain well and tip into a large bowl. Toss with the oil.

method.Step 2: Cut off and discard all the skin and pith from the oranges. Segment the oranges into the bowl of noodles, then squeeze out any excess juice from the membranes into the bowl. Add the stir-fry vegetables and Chinese leaf to the bowl, then toss everything together. Season to taste and set aside.

method.Step 3: Heat a frying pan over a medium heat. Rub the duck breasts with the five spice, then season. Cook for 5 minutes, then turn and cook for a further 5 minutes for pink, or longer if you like. Lift onto a plate to rest for 10 minutes, then slice diagonally. Divide the noodle salad between plates and top with slices of duck breast.
